task.summary: Default task
Shadow rendering and game optimisations.
Close to calculating shadows in deferred renderer, texture do not load right...
Tweaks before redos.
Wiped dumb stuff before lighting updates.
Added materials in preparation for a change of how models are saved and loaded.
Working on new file converters.
A bunch of useless stuff...
Added more models, relying on blender for most things now.
More model changes, need to remove outlines.
World building!
More world building.
Some orbital mechanics.
Lot's of cool maths done for now.
UI changes and bug fixes. UI's only work in 1080x720 ATM.

Added text background image. Slideshow maths broken.
OpenGL entities not working...
Tweaks in GUI and added terrains.
Fonts now aligned using a Enum, loading text aligned to the right is a WIP. Text buttons work better and are more modular.

Skybox things.

Skyboxes work very well, no complaints.
Smooth skybox transitions, and adjusted how GLSL shaders look.
Attempts to to rays for intersections.
